description: Semi colon separated list of values that will populate Access Request menus
name: About Us Choices

description:
Set as YES to include
Include additional agenda options:
Other
Prefer not to answer
name: Additional Gender Options

description: Admin Charge used by US, initially set as 1.33%
name: Admin Fee Charge

description: If provided this will be displayed instead of the default "Admin Fee".
name: Admin Fee Label

description: Slug of this spaces Admin Kapp (typically admin)
name: Admin Kapp Slug

description: Number of days that a school allows a Class Booking to me made in advance.
name: Advance Class Booking Cutoff

description: Slug of the Admin Kapp form that is used for managing system alerts (typically 'alerts').
name: Alerts Form Slug

description: Enable Cash Payment capture
name: Allow Cash Payments

description: Set to YES to allow a Coach profile to Promote students.
name: Allow Coach Promotions

description: YES if you will allow setting and tracking of Meeting scheduled calls
name: Allow Meeting Calls

description: The Queue kapp form which approvals should be created in (Overridden by Kapp and Form Attributes)
name: Approval Form Slug

description: Google auto complete API Key Key
name: AutoCompleteKey

description: gbmembers-gbshop, us-gbmembers-gbshop
name: AWS GBShop Bucket

description: gbmembers-photos, us-gbmembers-photos
name: AWS Photos Bucket

description: Region name for AWS file storage
name: AWS Region

description: Enter "YES" to allow the form to show an capture the Member Signature.
name: Bambora Freeze Show Signature

description: The company identifier for the Billing Service used by School
name: Billing Company

description: A value for Calendar time slots, such as 15, 10, 5 etc
name: Calendar Time Slots

description:
Number of days before a Cancellation date.
Used as part of the cancellation form.
name: Cancellation Duration

description: Region of Cards used (leave empty to default, US)
name: Card Region

description: Slug of this spaces Catalog Kapp (typically catalog)
name: Catalog Kapp Slug

description: Form used by users to request their manager be changed.
name: Change Manager Form Slug

description: Used for Franchise application, to identify the Countries within the Region
name: Countries

description: Currency value for Billing POS (AUD, USD ....)
name: Currency

description: Allows Space Administrators to set a default Kapp that will display for Users in their Space. This can be overridden by a User Profile Attribute.
name: Default Kapp Display

description: If set to true, users won't be able to request their own accounts. Only system administrators will be able to grant them access.
name: Disable Self Sign Up

description: The Discussion Id related to this space
name: Discussion Id

description: Url of this spaces response server
name: Discussion Server Url

description: Form used for collecting feedback about the kinops portal.
name: Feedback Form Slug

description: Name of the Space Bundle which allows for sharing of headers and footers
name: Footer Bundle Path

description:
"YES' if this school is an Affiliate of GB Online.
This value is used to send an email to GB Online when a new member is created.
name: GB Online Affiliate

description: Name of the Space Bundle which allows for sharing of headers and footers
name: Header Bundle Path

description: Form used by users to get help within the kinops portal.
name: Help Form Slug

description: Any users whose usernames match this regular expression, will not be shown in the Kapp.
name: Hidden Users Regex

description: YES to not apply a Admin fee percentage
name: Ignore Admin Fee

description: Semi colon separated list of values that will populate Access Request menus
name: Interested In Choices

description: Form used by Admins to mass invite others to kinops
name: Invite Others Form Slug

description: Billing WS URL for Members billing
name: Kinetic Billing Server URL

description: Name of the Space Bundle which allows for sharing of libraries between bundles.
name: Libraries Bundle Path

description: LiveChat License key
name: LiveChat License

description: Current Belt of Member
name: Member Belt Size

description: Discounts for family members
name: Member Discounts

description:
This date indicates the date which all members should have completed a waiver as a Lead or a Member.
If a new waiver is generate and all members are required to complete, this date is used to ensure a member has completed their waiver.
Indications in the application will identify members not compliant.
name: Member Waiver Compliance Date

description: Membership email, may be different to School email
name: Membership Email

description:
Location of the Meta JSON file to work with ReactCacheBuster.
This is to ensure code releases are automatically picked up.
name: Meta JSON Location

description: Migration Mode used to onboard billing information for a school.
name: Migration Mode

description: Weekly,Fortnightly,Monthly,Quarterly
name: Payment Frequencies

description:
Specify the Phone Number format for the school country.
AU ####-###-###
US ###-###-####
name: PhoneNumber Format

description: Accepted cards ['visa', 'mastercard', 'discover', 'amex', 'jcb', 'dinersclub', 'maestro', 'laser', 'unionpay', 'elo', 'hipercard']
name: POS Accepted Cards

description: Percentage sales tax value to be applied on top of sub-total
name: POS Sales Tax

description: Percentage sales tax value to be applied on top of sub-total
name: POS Sales Tax 2

description: Surcharge, Sales Tax, GST, VAT etc..
name: POS Sales Tax Label

description: Surcharge, Sales Tax, GST, VAT etc..
name: POS Sales Tax Label 2

description: URL for processing POS credit card
name: POS Service URL

description: Publishable key used for API access
name: POS Stripe Publishable Key

description: System name for process POS transactions
name: POS System

description:
Specify the Postcode format for the school country.
AU ####
US ######
name: Postcode Format

description: A URL to open the schools Private Policy (a document or web page)
name: Privacy Policy

description: Slug of this spaces Queue Kapp (typically queue)
name: Queue Kapp Slug

description: Form used for requesting an alert be displayed in the kinops portal.
name: Request Alert Form Slug

description: For Stripe Terminal
name: School City

description:
A list of dates that the school will be closed.
Mainly used for the website trial booking feature.
Use YYYY-MM-DD format, comma seperated.
name: School Closed Dates

description: ISO 3166-1 country code for School (US-United States, CA-Canada)
name: School Country Code

description: Additional school email addresses that can be applied to Email campaigns
name: School Email Alias

description:
Charge to be applied when an account is Frozen, such as 25 ($25 per month).
For Fortnightly, this will be divided by 2.
name: School Freeze Charge

description: From Alias name for school
name: School From Alias

description: Legal name used for Billing terms
name: School Legal Name

description: For Stripe Terminal
name: School Postcode

description: Date when a school will start accepting Trial Bookings via the GB Calendar widget
name: School Start Date

description: For Stripe Terminal
name: School State

description:
State code used for Calendar Public holidays.
Based on values used with api:
https://date.nager.at/api/v3/NextPublicHolidays/
name: School State Code

description: States for country the school is based in
name: School States

description: Full timetable website URL
name: School Timetable URL

description:
Set as "YES" to disallow the Select Member dropdown in the Self Checkin mode.
When set the Scanning option will be the only available option to check in.
name: Self Checkin Scan Only

description: Number of days until service is expected to be fulfilled - Overridden by Form / Kapp Attribute
name: Service Days Due

description: Slugs needed to appears in the Services Report
name: Services Slugs

description: Use a shared workflow engine (true/false)?
name: Shared Workflow Engine

description: NO if you want to only show "Available" instead of "Open Spots: X"
name: Show Class Spots Remaining

description: Account ID for the school, such as, acct_1KndiLPh1yLRrgic
name: Stripe Account ID

description: Defines which workflow type should be executed for each type of action. All values should be prefixed with an action (Submitted, Created, Updated, Deleted) Workflow type options are (True, False, or a custom process name) This attribute can be overridden by a kapp or form's attribute Ex (Submitted - False | Submitted - True | Submitted - My Custom Process)
name: Submission Workflow

description: Form used to request a new service be added to the catalog.
name: Suggest a Service Form Slug

description:
YES to switch to Select class first then provide name details.
The default is to provide name details first then select a class.
name: Switch Trial Class Booking Order

description: Email Address of the System Administrator who should receive emails about system issues
name: System Administrator Email

description: Username of user to assign tasks to if not defined in a form or kapp.
name: Task Assignee Individual

description: Team to assign tasks to if not defined in a form or kapp.
name: Task Assignee Team

description: The Queue kapp form to use when creating a task item (Overridden by Kapp and Form Attributes)
name: Task Form Slug

description: Slug of the space the task engine is routed
name: Task Server Space Slug

description: Name of the source for this space in the workflow engine
name: Task Source Name

description: Example, GST VAT
name: TAX 1 Label

description: 5% GST for Canada
name: TAX 1 Value

description: For Canada, HSP, PST or QST
name: TAX 2 Label

description: For Canada, HSP PST or QST
name: TAX 2 Value

description: For Canada, HSP PST or QST
name: TAX 3 Label

description: For Canada, HSP PST or QST
name: TAX 3 Value

description: Slug of this spaces Tech Bar Kapp (typically tech-bar)
name: Tech Bar Kapp Slug

description:
Use with the website Trial Booking widget.
The default without this setting is 2 for 2 hours prior.
name: Trial Booking Cut Off

description: Return URL after a lead completes the Calendar widget Contact Us, Book a Trial or Self Signup
name: Trial Booking Thank you URL

description: Name of google calendar that will be used for all Intro/Free class appointments.
name: Trial Calendar Name

description: Items if selected will be hidden on the Adult/Womens/Kids waiver forms.
name: Waiver Hidden Items

description: Url of the request web server that this space exists
name: Web Server Url
